title: Cube Root Calculator
description: Calculate the cube root of any number. Find the cube root of positive and negative numbers.

inputs.name: number
inputs.label: Number
inputs.helpText: Enter any number (positive or negative) to find its cube root

variables.number: The number to find the cube root of

howTo: Enter a number in the input field (can be positive or negative)
Click "Calculate" to compute the cube root
The result shows the cube root of the entered number
Unlike square roots, cube roots can be calculated for negative numbers

faq.question: What is a cube root?
faq.answer: A cube root of a number is a value that, when multiplied by itself three times, gives the original number. For example, the cube root of 8 is 2 because 2 × 2 × 2 = 8.

faq.question: Can I calculate the cube root of negative numbers?
faq.answer: Yes! Unlike square roots, cube roots can be calculated for negative numbers. For example, the cube root of -27 is -3 because (-3) × (-3) × (-3) = -27.

faq.question: What is the cube root of 0?
faq.answer: The cube root of 0 is 0, because 0 × 0 × 0 = 0.

faq.question: How is this different from square root?
faq.answer: Square root finds a number that when squared (multiplied by itself once) equals the original number. Cube root finds a number that when cubed (multiplied by itself twice) equals the original number.
